sections.heading: 3-301 through 3-319 of this title shall be known as the "Unified Community Mental Health Services Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1980, c. 291, ยง 1, eff. Oct. 1, 1980. Amended by Laws 1985, c. 276, ยง 1, emerg. eff. July 22, 1985; Laws 1986, c. 103, ยง 29, eff. Nov. 1, 1986. Renumbered from ยง 613 of this title by
